subject: Baseball
Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
Series
Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant (Japan)
lead_paragraph: The disasters in Japan prompted Tohoku High School baseball players and coaches to agonize over whether it was appropriate to pursue the national title during a national emergency.
snippet: The disasters in Japan prompted Tohoku High School baseball players and coaches to agonize over whether it was appropriate to pursue the national title during a national emergency.
